verses.text: Conh b'itanec d'a tzalajk'olal d'a Dios tz'ak'an quip. Conh avajec d'a tzalajk'olal sco b'itan co Diosal a onh yinhtilal onh vinhaj Jacob tic.
Conh b'itanec yed' pandereta yed' te' arpa vach' sk'anhi yed' pax salterio.
Co puec q'uen trompeta ayic tz'alji q'uen uj. Co puec pax q'ueen ayic sk'ojnaj q'uen uj chi', yujto nivan q'uinh jun chi' d'ayonh.
Aton jun checnab'il ix yak' Dios d'ayonh a onh israel onh tic, a onh yinhtilal onh vinhaj Jacob.
Ix alchaj d'ayonh yinhtilal onh vinhaj José tic, ayic ix b'at Dios oval d'a Egipto. Ata' ix cab' jun lolonel, palta manh cojtacoc mach ix lolon chi'.
Ix yalan d'ayonh: Toxo ix vik'canel eyicatz d'a yich e patic. Toxo ix vik'canel jun munlajel te ya d'a eyib'anh.
Ix in eyavtejcoti ayic ayex och d'a syaelal, a inxo ix ex in colo'. Ix ex in tak'vej d'a scal asun ayic sk'anh k'u. Ix ex vak' proval d'a a' yic Meriba.
Ex in chonhab', ab'ec tas svala', a in van in lolon d'ayex. Ex israel, octom tzin e k'anab'ajej.
Malajocab' sdiosal eb' ch'oc chonhab'il ayek' d'ayex. Manh eyaq'uem e b'a d'a juntzanh comon dios chi'.
A in Jehová e Diosal in, a in ix ex viq'uelta d'a yol yic Egipto. Jaquec e ti', ol ex in vatzitej.
Palta maj yal e k'ol ix in e k'anab'ajej a ex in chonhab' Israel ex tic.
Yuj chi' ix ex vactejcan yuj e pital, ix eyak'an e gana icha snib'ej e k'ool.
Ex in chonhab' Israel, octom ix eyab' tas ix vala'. Octom ix e b'eyb'alej in checnab'il.
Ix am vak'och yaelal d'a yib'anh eb' ayoch ajk'olal d'ayex. Junnhej am mutz'satil ix aj in satanel eb'.
A eb' tzin yajaneli, toxonhej am nhojoji yek' eb' yuj xivelal d'ayin. Axo syaelal eb', scan d'a yib'anh eb' d'a junelnhej.
Palta a exxo tic, ix am ex in vatzitej. A am val ixim trigo te vach' ix vak' d'ayex. Ix am vak' nok' yalchab' tz'elta d'a sattac q'uen q'ueen eyuq'uej yic tzex tzalaji, xchi Jehová.
